reviews.review_msg: I highly recommend this prof. I had him for HUM 360 and HUM387 in the same term. His assignments are straightforward and enjoyable as they give you flexibility to relate interests to the course content. He is a bit slow at returning marks. However, his lectures are interesting, very knowledgeable, and he cares about his students.
He's such a cutie patootie, he's just a bit slow with marking but he's so passionate about what he teaches and is just an overall amazing guy.

Professor Sofos was a kind and approachable prof who answered all my emails within 48hrs or less!The class itself was not very difficult as your grade is essentially based on two essays and the final.The problem I had was that we were assigned about 25 readings and some of them were quite long and for first year they were difficult to keep up with.

I took this course for the writing credit, and it was way more enjoyable than I thought it would be. He made the topic very enjoyable and was really easygoing and friendly to talk to. The grading criteria for all the assignments were very clear, and the study guide for the final exam was also very helpful. Overall, he was such a great professor!

Took this course as an elective and was one of the BEST profs I've had!! He was super nice and approachable. Always had an answer to all my questions. Super chill and considerate about assignment due dates. Courseload was moderate: 2 essays, a project and a final(exam guide was provided!). Would take this course again just to have him as my prof!
